TopicTitle: Can't change vessels names in the Tracking Station

Articles.Content: I don't know if it's only me, but after sending a couple of satelites into orbit to stablish a good communication web with the planet, I decided to go to the Tracking Station and change the names of the probes because all of them have the same vessel name. The error I found happens when you edit the name and press enter. At first, it looks like they have been changed but when you go somewhere else and return to the Tracking Station, the names go back to the original name.
And occasionally it tries to rename the KSC on you… but I’ve noticed this in launch-version and Patch 1 as well… haven’t tried it since Patch 2 though.
